description: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/10286/ introduced the ability to configure glance via the keystone service catalog, however it throws an exception if there is more than one glance endpoint configured. It would be better to round robin between the various endpoints if more than one is present.
title: Allow more than one glance to be configured in the service catalog

comments.content: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/10286/ introduced the ability to configure glance via the keystone service catalog, however it throws an exception if there is more than one glance endpoint configured. It would be better to round robin between the various endpoints if more than one is present.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mikal

comments.content: The patch hasn't actually been merged yet, so I think we should leave this bug in Incomplete and only Confirm it once the code goes in (or mark as Invalid if it doesn't).
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb

comments.content: It didn't go in, so marking as Invalid. Please reopen if still valid.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
